metadata.title: CVE-2021-2226 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
Vulnerability in the MySQL Server product of Oracle MySQL (component:Server: Information Schema). Supported versions that are affected are5.7.33 and prior and 8.0.23 and prior. Easily exploitable vulnerabilityallows high privileged attacker with network access via multiple protocolsto compromise MySQL Server. Successful attacks of this vulnerability canresult in unauthorized access to critical data or complete access to allMySQL Server accessible data. CVSS 3.1 Base Score 4.9 (Confidentialityimpacts). CVSS Vector: (CVSS:3.1/AV:N/AC:L/PR:H/UI:N/S:U/C:H/I:N/A:N).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-2226` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmysqlclient20 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-client-core-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-common - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-server-core-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-source-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
mysql-testsuite-5.7 - 5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mysql-5.7 package in esm-infra/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.7.35-0ubuntu0.16.04.1+esm1').
mariadb-10.0 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-xtradb-cluster-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
percona-server-5.6 package in esm-apps/xenial is affected and needs fixing.
